text: The app crashes every time I try to upload a file larger than 10MB. This is really frustrating because I need to upload reports for my team.
I love the product but I wish there was a dark mode. I work late at night and the bright screen is hard on my eyes.
We're a team of 50 and the per-seat pricing is making it hard to justify rolling this out company-wide. Any volume discounts?
The dashboard takes about 30 seconds to load when I have more than 100 projects. This makes it nearly unusable for power users.
I can never find the export button. I've looked everywhere in the UI but it's just not intuitive where that feature lives.
